Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders.leader_abilities

Class Depot

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.leaders.leader_abilities.Depot
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies, HasStatus, LeaderAbility
public class Depot extends Object implements LeaderAbility
This implementation of LeaderAbility is a depot, so it implements all of the methods to manage a depot (add and remove supplies).

    • addMarble

      public void addMarble​(MarbleColor color, LeadersSpace ls) throws MarbleException, SupplyException
      Tries to add a marble to a depot container
      Specified by:
      addMarble in interface LeaderAbility
      Parameters:
      color - color to add
      ls - used to check if a white ball conversion is possible
      Throws:
      MarbleException - cannot add the specified marble color to the depot, or conversion is not possible
      SupplyException - depot is full

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the supply to the storage. Information about the source of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply

    • removeSupply

      public void removeSupply​(WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException

      Specified by:
      removeSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      Throws:

    • clearSupplies

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies()
      Removes all of the supplies.
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface LeaderAbility
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.
